mapper.select: SELECT news_id as newsId, title, content, summary, url, thumbnail, category_id as categoryId, FORMATDATETIME(created_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') as createdAt, FORMATDATETIME(modified_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') as modifiedAt FROM news WHERE news_id = #{id}

SELECT news_id as newsId, title, content, summary, url, thumbnail, category_id as categoryId, is_write as isWrite, created_at as createdAt, modified_at as modifiedAt FROM news WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (title, content, summary, url, category_id, thumbnail) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{url}, #{categoryId}, #{thumbnail});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE url = #{url}
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET summary = #{summaryText}, modified_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
UPDATE news SET is_write = #{isWrite}, modified_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
